tinycolors.main¶

tinycolors v0.6.1: A tiny, useful, and readable color library for fast colors, and a large library. Having a very large library of colorization and super readable syntax, tinycolors is the color library you were looking for.

Attributes¶

COLOR_NAMES

STYLE_NAMES

COLOR_MAP

STYLE_MAP

Exceptions¶

ColorNotFoundError

Call this if the error has something to do with a color

StyleNotFoundError

Call this if the error has something to do with a style

class tinycolors.main.ColorOptions[source]¶

Bases: TypedDict

dict() -> new empty dictionary dict(mapping) -> new dictionary initialized from a mapping object’s

(key, value) pairs

dict(iterable) -> new dictionary initialized as if via:

d = {} for k, v in iterable:

d[k] = v

dict(**kwargs) -> new dictionary initialized with the name=value pairs

in the keyword argument list. For example: dict(one=1, two=2)

color: COLOR_NAMES | None[source]¶
style: STYLE_NAMES | None[source]¶
bg: COLOR_NAMES | None[source]¶
